page.title: 19Calne Swimming Club.
page.content: My name is Joanne Burchell.My hobby is swimming.I go three times a week to the Alpha Four Swimming Club at Calne Sports Centre.I also go there from school with my class.I am practising for my Merit Badge. On Sundays,I do Synchronized Swimming.I am trying for a badge at this sport too.You have to do a somersault and come up on your front, do another somersault and come up on your back. You also have to do movement called "Bobbing".You have to lift your arms in the air and you go under water. Then you bring your arms down and you bob up again.You try to swim a whole width under water.A"Corkscrew" is a twisting action while you are lying on the surface of the water.
